successes.title: BattleCON: War Remastered
successes.description: BattleCON brings the tension of 2D fighting games to life as a card game with 18 playable characters and tons of extras!

Pledges.description: BACKER - Access to updates, downloadable bonus content, and a special supporter award on BattleConnection.com! All higher tiers include this as well.
ENTHUSIAST - Get a set of 6 limited edition 1.5-inch character pins. You can add these onto higher tiers for $10 extra.
VIRTUAL FIGHTER - Access to Print and Play Editions of BattleCON: War and the Alternate Art Edition of BattleCON: War.
VETERAN - Get just War: Extended Edition, which contains all the new content, players' choice characters, and stretch goals!

VIRTUAL FIGHTER PLUS - Access to Print and Play Editions of BattleCON: War and the Alternate Art Edition of BattleCON: War, plus Print and Play Editions of BattleCON: Devastation and the Alternate Art Edition of BattleCON: Devastation!
FIGHTER - Get BattleCON: War Remastered Edition!
FIGHTER PLUS - Get BattleCON: War and War Extended Edition!

PLUSH TOY - A unique, hand-crafted plush toy of any BattleCON character of your choice. You can add any other pledge tier or add-ons on top of this tier (except sponsor tiers) by adding the prices of the two tiers together and selecting this one. See example dolls at: http://bit.ly/1uM0E0u
DUELIST - Get BattleCON: War and its sequel, BattleCON: Devastation!

FIGHTER DELUXE - All of the new games, expansions, and characters that we're creating in this project. War: Remastered, War: Extended Edition, the Light and Shadow Small Expansion, the Armory Small Expansion, a playmat, some promotional pins, and all the promo fighters.
DUELIST PLUS - War and Devastation AND extras: Get BattleCON: War, BattleCON: Devastation, Extended Editions for both games, plus Strikers.
MERCENARY PACK - This tier is intended for stores and game clubs, and contains 5 copies of War!
WORLD OF INDINES - A game from every series in the World of Indines: BattleCON: War, Pixel Tactics 1, Argent: the Consortium, Disc Duelers, and Seven Card Slugfest.

DUELIST DELUXE - All of BattleCON, and everything new from this project. War, Devastation, both Extended Editions, all Add-on Expansions (Armory, Light & Shadow, & Strikers), a playmat, and the pin set.
MERCENARY KING PACK - For larger stores or big gaming clubs. This pack contains 10 copies of BattleCON: War.

WORLD OF INDINES PLUS - All the games in the World of Indines line AND their expansions: BattleCON: War, BattleCON: Devastation, Strikers, Extended Editions for both games, Pixel Tactics 1, 2, and 3, plus all the Pixel Tactics minipaks, Argent: the Consortium, Argent: 'Mancers of the University, Argent: Summer Break, Disc Duelers, Seven Card Slugfest, and all the promo cards for all these games!

PLAYMAT SPONSOR - You can pick two characters from the cast of BattleCON, and we'll draw a dynamic dueling art of them and create a new playmat. You will receive 10 copies of this mat, and it will be available to all backers as an add-on. This reward also includes the WORLD OF INDINES PLUS tier items.

POSTER SPONSOR - You can pick two characters from the cast of BattleCON: War, and weâ€™ll draw a dynamic dueling art of them and create a poster that will be included in each box of BattleCON: War. You will receive an oversized vinyl banner of this poster art. This reward also includes the WORLD OF INDINES PLUS tier items.
